title: Topic 001 Question 122
body: A SysOps administrator must configure a resilient tier of Amazon EC2 instances for a high performance computing (HPC) application. The HPC application requires minimum latency between nodes.
Which actions should the SysOps administrator take to meet these requirements? (Choose two.)
options: Create an Amazon Elastic File System (Amazon EFS) file system. Mount the file system to the EC2 instances by using user data.
Create a Multi-AZ Network Load Balancer in front of the EC2 instances.
Place the EC2 instances in an Auto Scaling group within a single subnet.
Launch the EC2 instances into a cluster placement group.
Launch the EC2 instances into a partition placement group.
